unnormalised: **Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to a Brighter Future, Yaar!**
normalised: Scholarship Portals: Your Ticket to a Brighter Future, Friend!

unnormalised: Hey students! Feeling the pressure of those hefty college fees? Don't sweat it! Scholarship portals are the *jugaad* you need. These online platforms are like treasure troves, packed with info on scholarships – from merit-based to need-based, covering everything from engineering at IIT Delhi to arts at Banaras Hindu University.
normalised: Hey students! Feeling the pressure of those hefty college fees? Don't sweat it! Scholarship portals are the clever solution you need. These online platforms are like treasure troves, packed with info on scholarships – from merit-based to need-based, covering everything from engineering at I I T Delhi to arts at Banaras Hindu University.

unnormalised: Think of them as your personal scholarship *didi*, guiding you through the application process. Forget trawling through endless websites; these portals centralize everything. Many even offer personalized recommendations based on your profile, like suggesting scholarships for students from Tier-2 cities or those scoring above 90% in their 12th boards, as was the case for Priya Sharma from Lucknow last year.

Many even offer personalized recommendations based on your profile, like suggesting scholarships for students from Tier two cities or those scoring above ninety percent in their twelfth boards, as was the case for Priya Sharma from Lucknow last year.

unnormalised: Some popular ones include Buddy4Study, Vidyalakshmi, and even the Govt's National Scholarship Portal. Remember to check deadlines! Applications for several postgraduate scholarships close on 30/09/2024. And remember to start early – registration often opens months in advance. For example, applications for the JN Tata Endowment open around 10:00 hrs on 01/07/2024. Plus, keep your documents handy. You'll typically need transcripts, income certificates (if applicable) showing family income below Rs. 6 Lakhs per annum, and your Aadhaar card details. One last pro-tip: many scholarships require a minimum residency of 5 years in India, so keep that in mind. Good luck, and may the scholarship gods be ever in your favor! Final results are usually declared around 15/08/2024!
